Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa

Class DMW2DRW

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.DMW2DRW
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, Conversion<FSA,​FSA>
public class DMW2DRW
extends AbstractAlgorithm
implements Conversion<FSA,​FSA>
This class provides a conversion from DMW to equivalent DRW [Berndt Farwer. ω-Automata. In Automata, Logics, and Infinite Games: A Guide to Current Research. LNCS 2500, pp. 3-20, Springer Verlag, 2002]. The acceptance condition {(E1, F1), (E2, F2), ..., (Ei, Fi)} of the DRW is guaranteed to be a chain, that is, E1 ⊆ F1 ⊆ E2 ⊆ F2 ⊆ ... ⊆ Ei ⊆ Fi.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    Nested Classes

    (package private) class  DMW2DRW.RabinState
    A RabinState is a pair of a sequence of states in the DMW and a latest appearance record.
